title: RIOT WJAT HAPPEN??
body:
hello riot I would like to ask yous something do you delete accounts due to inactivity? 
coz at this moment I have a account that wont let me sign into, maybe there is an issue with the sign in or the client itself but I would really like to no what the problem is 
the account is : _Username removed_ on the oce sever.
please let me no on here or by email please : _email removed_
by the way, I have been using the account for close to 7 years if it was deleted due to inactivity that isn't cover by your teams of use. please let me no 
thank you

replies.body:
If you're having issues accessing your account, please submit an Account Recovery ticket to our Player Support team, and they'll be able to work with you there:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Feel free to ping me if you have any questions!

Hey Bubblebunny,

Accounts aren't deleted for inactivity, so your issue can't be that. Do you think you can send me a screen shot of the error message that pops up when you try to log in?

and i just look at the account it was active about on the 9th of this month 
so I don't no what happen to my account but I want it back

oh and to add i think the email i used to sign up no longer works so if you say just use the email to recover your account please spear me that bs please 
i just wanna know what happen to my account please
thank you
